i18n.title: Number Is Negative Zero
i18n.description: In this lab, we will explore how to determine whether a given number is a negative zero or not, using JavaScript. We will use a simple function that checks if the value is equal to zero and if 1 divided by the value equals -Infinity. This lab will help you understand the concept of negative zero in JavaScript and how to detect it in your code.

meta.title: Detecting Negative Zero in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to determine if a number is a negative zero using a simple JavaScript function.
